data.title: Kenji Hata
data.meta_description: Kenji Hata is a motion capture actor and technical advisor. data.text:
Kenji Hata is a motion capture actor and technical advisor.

Career[]

Hata was a member of the motion capture department for the remake of Resident Evil;[1] a Motion Capture coordinator for Resident Evil 0,[2] and a stunt supervisor for Resident Evil Outbreak[3] and a Motion Actor for Resident Evil: Dead Aim.[4] Hata is also credited as the Resident Evil 4 MoCap technical advisor and Bitores Méndez and Ramón Salazar's motion capture actors.[5][6]

Bibliography[]

Sumner, Christian; Shotten, Brian; Owen, Michael, eds (9 November 2005). Resident Evil Archives: Umbrella's Virus Uncovered. Translated by Zpang America, Inc.. BradyGames. ISBN 0744006554.

Ōno, Tetsuya; Masui, Kō, eds (31 March 2005). biohazard archives. Famitsu. ISBN 4-906-582-31-1.

Davis, H. Leigh, ed (2011). Resident Evil Archives II. Translated by Elizabeth Ellis. Indianapolis: BradyGames. ISBN 0744013216.
